subsection_analysis.refined_text:
As a Travel Planner, Plan a trip to a beach for 10 college friends.:

Title: [Inst] As a Travel Planner, Plan a trip to a beach for 10 college friends.

Introduction:
I am excited to plan a trip to a beach for 10 college friends. This is a group of students who are passionate about travel and adventure.

Goals:
The main goal is to have a memorable, fun and adventurous trip to the beach. We want our friends to feel relaxed, get to know each other better, and have a great time.

Things to Consider:
We will start early morning and leave the hotel around 7:30am. We will spend three days at the beach, exploring the area, enjoying activities like volleyball, swimming, and snorkeling. Our friends are experienced in beach activities, so we will plan

subsection_analysis.document: South of France - Things to Do.pdf
subsection_analysis.refined_text: As a Travel Planner, Plan a trip of 4 days for a group of 10 college friends. The plan includes activities like hiking, camping, swimming, and sightseeing. The group consists of 10 students of different ages and genders, ranging from 17 to 26. The budget is $1000, including flights, accommodations, and transportation. The plan aims to have a fun-filled trip while also promoting social interaction and teamwork among the participants.
